name: Red Light Green Light (delnar)
description:
Red Light Green Light is a racing game where you must select a random light. If it is green, you go. If it is red, you don't. Compete against your friends to see who can go the farthest. 

This is my first real game using Game Maker Studio 2 (Version 2.3 Beta). It still a little rough around the edges, but I wanted to release for anyone interested in playing a windows version of it. 

This game was developed for the Children's Church Online of Shasta Baptist Church. To play it on-line, go to this link.
